int gcd(int a,int b)
{
 int r, i;
  while(b!=0){
    r = a % b;
    a = b;
    b = r;
  }
  return a;
}

long long int power(long long int x,long long int y,ll mod)
{
    long long int temp,ty,my;
    if( y == 0)
        return 1;
    temp = power(x, y/2,mod);
    ty=(temp%mod)*(temp%mod);
    if (y%2 == 0)
        {

                return ty%mod;
        }
    else
        {
                my=(x%mod)*(ty%mod);
                return my%mod;
        }
}


ll mod=1000000007;

ll dp[1000100];

void pre()
{
    ll i,j,k,p;

    dp[0]=1;
    dp[1]=3;
    dp[2]=9;

    for(i=3;i<100010;i++)
    {
        dp[i]=(dp[i-1]*3)%mod;
        dp[i]=(dp[i]-dp[i-3] +mod)%mod;
    }

}
int main()
{
	ll t,n,j,k,tt,i;
	cin>>t;
	pre();
	while(t--)
    {
		cin>>n;

	}

}
